es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.exe.util
Class TemporaryFileManager

java.lang.Object
  es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.exe.util.TemporaryFileManager

public class TemporaryFileManager
extends java.lang.Object

A singleton class to manage the temporary files usage in the application. It should be accessible for every thread that gets part in the execution.

setTree

public void setTree(pal.tree.Tree tree)
Sets the input tree. For each manager sync, the input tree should be set just once, or all the trees must be the same (i.e., this method can be used to check consistency between processes)

Parameters:
tree - the new tree
Throws:
ProtTestInternalException - when attempting to set different trees
